content.detailedDescription: I went outside to feed the dog. heard sirens but did not pay much attention to them. was about to go back inside trailer when i looked up and seen three lights that were triangular in shape heading toward the mountains. they were moving in one direction and didn't seem to waver from direction. i watched untill it went behind trees and seemed to disapear. i went inside real quick to tell the wife and then back outside over to the neighbores to see if i could see it better. i could only see it just a second longer but then gone.
content.summary: 3 lighted triangualr obkect

content.detailedDescription:
We wanted to cross the border by bike, it was 5 of as, start point was sabac (serbia) and goal was bijeljina (bosnia and hercegovina) is 50km range and we decided to do it  in one day and come back in sabac... the goal was traveling no destinacion, we went slowly and stops everywhere we wants to... 


in bijeljina we was in 8p.M take it something to eat, chill in downtown and one girl decided to go home with bus... 4 of as decided to rest a little bit out side of bijeljina just to get some energy for returnig back... we find nice place in bijeljina in some park, we was put big blanket on a grass and lie down, me and one guy was watching in west direction another two in east... 

i was realy come down, just enjoying night sky... it was cloudy but just small group of clouds, it was starly too... in one momment i was looking in one cloud and bump the object big triangle, similar letter a without a hole in the middle of the letter.. it was gray and black no light no sound in last momment the nose start to be transparent and then tail and middle part...
i was thing i was think i hallucinating, i was tired and in thet mommen i was think i am in game but friend to me start to yell, wtf do you see what i see...  hi was explained the same shape like i saw...
if this was told me my best friend i will tall him probably you was tired or saw air plane or some miletery stuff... but nooo... this was something else... i was try to risearch of history in this area if someone saw similer object... but for sure i chance my mind... no any more just science...
content.summary: Black-gray triangle come out of the cloud and disappears after 2sec. transparent

content.detailedDescription:
I was just taking a stroll in my terrace when i observed a huge cloud towards the north of my position.
just random sight cause it was huge.
looked like a cloud formation to me, and still i guess its a cloud but i have never in my life seen such a formation before.
a cloud positioned stationary doing nothing.
i took a picture of it and waited if i could notice anything more about it but nothing came out.
i didnt , after sometime i went away .
content.summary: Its a cloud like structure towards north of my house.

content.detailedDescription: It was a power-cut. i went into the gallery (3rd floor) and looked out to check if the whole area had a power-cut, it didn't. then i noticed a glowing aspirin-sized orb in the sky, near buildings, but it seemed quite from my place. it was moving really slowly, such that motion could not be orbserved through naked eyes.  i figured that it was a ufo and i started taking pictures. i took 2 pictures and went back in my room. after about two minutes, i went back in the gallery and took 2 more pictures and came back in. after about a minute, i went back out and it was nowhere to be seen, maybe i couldn't see it because of the buildings, as it was lowering. when i checked the pictures, i could see that it had followed a straight-line path and was lowering. i also found another unidentified object in one of the pictures, and it doesn't resemble an orb, it seems more like a boomerang. the orb was glowing continuously, but fading once or twice. i don't remember having been affected psychologically by the sighting.
content.summary: Gradual straight line path of glowing orb and changed shape

content.detailedDescription: It was a power-cut. i went into the gallery (3rd floor) and looked out to check if the whole area had a power-cut, it didn't. then i noticed a glowing aspirin-sized orb in the sky, near buildings, but it seemed quite from my place. it was moving really slowly, such that motion could not be orbserved through naked eyes.  i figured that it was a ufo and i started taking pictures. i took 2 pictures and went back in my room. after about two minutes, i went back in the gallery and took 2 more pictures and came back in. after about a minute, i went back out and it was nowhere to be seen, maybe i couldn't see it because of the buildings, as it was lowering. when i checked the pictures, i could see that it had followed a straight-line path and was lowering. i also found another unidentified object in one of the pictures, and it doesn't resemble an orb, it seems more like a boomerang. the orb was glowing continuously, but fading once or twice. i don't remember having been affected psychologically by the sighting.
content.summary: Gradual straight line path of glowing orb and changed shape

content.detailedDescription:
This is probably useless information but when i was a kid in the 70's and told people what i saw, they said i was dreaming.

there were beings who came into my bedroom and stood on the porch roof outside my bedroom at night. i would cry, please stop! they were about 3 feet tall and my lived near a farm. my dad told me they were stray cats because of the triangular face. they weren't cats!

i wasn't allowed to watch tv for a long time because my parents thought the television shows were giving me the "bad dreams"!

the closest neighbor was 200 yards away and asked me why my night light was so bright. i only had a little christmas tree light. she said it was so bright, she was concerned that the house might be on fire but she could tell it wasn't fire. just a bright light.

i was born in 1970 and we moved out of that house in 1979 and i never saw them again but i know what i remember. i've been trying to tell myself it was dreams for 35 years. i know it wasn't dreams.

like i said, useless information after 35 years but it feels good to tell somebody who won't say, "you were dreaming." and the neighbor who asked about the super bright light wasn't dreaming either.

thanks,
greg
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: I went outside with my binoculars to see if i can see any meteors from the per. meteor shower.  i could not get a good view from the front courtyard so i went to the back courtyard which has a clearer view of the northeast.  as i approached the backyard, i looked up an instantly recognized 3 bright red lights. perfect angle with a perfect view.  i looked at them with my binoculars and can tell those lights are no airplanes.  i frantically tapped on the glass slider to get my girlfriends attention, twice.  when she came to the window, i told her to get out here and see these red lights that are in the sky.  when she came out, she saw the 3 red lights instantly and realized that those could not be from an airplane.  she looked at the red lights through my binoculars and realized that they are all moving at the same speed, as if they were one unit.  we passed the binoculars back and forth, and i too was beginning to realized that they were not separate lights but that they looked as if to be as one craft.  a very large craft, possibly an enormous craft. we lost sight of it because of the neighbors house, so my girlfriend went to the front yard to see if she could see it crossing over but nothing.  i went on to call my brother. that was amazing and scary to see something that was truly without a doubt...Humungous, enormous, gigantic, and o.O.T.W.(out of this world)!!!
content.summary: 3 bright red lights looked like a triangle moving as one

content.detailedDescription: Red fire ball was seen buy my father coming from seal beach called me outside i seen a fire orange rectangular lite going toward signal hill as it passed signal hill 330 high it stoped and turned bright white and started blinking slowly moved away toward lakewood stoped and was hovering  i was watching with 7x35 binoculars it turned dark i could it was disced shaped there was bright flash and some thing red hot droped from the bottom half way to the ground it stoped glowing the hull appeared to powering up with different areas glowing it looked like it was having problems powering up it totally disappeared for a minute and then reapeard in the same spot it slowly moved away and slightly up an tell you could see the atmosphere turning blue and white comeing from the front and on the sides as it went into outer space
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started as red fire ball turned orange rectanguler turned brite white and started blinking wint dark some thing red hot fell from disc watched craft penatrate apnasphere 7x35 binuculers

content.detailedDescription: Was walking collie dog we got to where bean feilds are he looked up and ran the feild is between trees it was hoovering black thick in the middle and sharp on the edges it had two lights on either side of middle that looked like drums lite ftom the inside i stared at it for along time i decided its frightened ing me so i left i came back it was gone there was no evidence at all
content.summary: Black v shaped object with two drum shaped lights on either side of middle hoovering over a bean feild between trees my dog ran

content.detailedDescription: I was outside when i saw a light jumping around. then it shot out towards me and then red beams of light fanned out from the light and started like scanning from up to down. i ran in house before it could scan me. scared me. never seen anything like it. i've seen the jumping lights before when i lives in boise a few years ago. that's why i noticed the jumping light that night
content.summary: Saw light jumping, then red beams came out of light & started like scanning.

content.detailedDescription: Appx. dec. 1976 i was visiting relatives in michigan. driving home from a friends home with my toddler i suddenly, very suddenly had a bright white light over and around my car.The light covered my car. i remember it glaring into all the windows. i saw no object. i heard no sound. there was no heat.The next thing i remember was walking downstairs at my in-laws home appx 9-10am. my family commented on me sleeping late and asked if i was ok. the oddest thing is that i had no memory of any of this for at least 10 years. my daughter, who by then was appx 13 yrs old and i were making the trip from muskegon michigan to the cedarville area. we were just chatting about an unrelated subject and the memory was just there. i had not been intoxicated or on meds when the experience happened. i'm reporting this as since that memory i have an interest in ufo phenomena. there is no more i can add as all i remember is the light and missing time. no marks on our bodies. no implants, i hope. car worked ok. cedarville was close to kincheloe afb so after i remembered this i assumed it was related to an aircraft. but all i ever saw was the light right above me. and the missing time is unusual.I do remember that i was terrified by the unexplainable light so it's not something i would have just forgotten.
content.summary: Bright light suddenly appeared over my car. no heat. no memory of subsequent ride home. no memory of event for over 10 yrs.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning to our home in boardman ohio from akron ohio. we were east-bound on route 76. at 9:32 p.M. we were just west of lake milton, when i saw the object, very large and low, over the road. it was traveling west-bound directly towards us. i said to my wife, "look, another black triangle!" we had a very similar experience about 5 years ago that was somewhat more dramatic, and have since come to learn a little more about this sort of sighting. at the time, i didn't know where or how to report such a thing, and have since wanted to report our original incident because it was more unusual, but i never made note of the date.
this time we wanted to do what we wish we could have done last time. i told my wife, "quick, shoot some video!" since she had her phone in her hand, but she couldn't get it in video mode. i carry a point and shoot camera with video capability in my front pocket, and struggled to get it out, while keeping an eye on the craft, and drive in fairly heavy traffic at speeds 65-70 mph. i wasn't able to shoot any video. i had slowed quite a bit and the traffic behind me was getting angry. the craft originally appeared to be directly over the west-bound lane, heading west. it passed by us on our left, then veered towards the north-west. i could see it moving away as i looked over my left shoulder.
the object was very large, slow and silent. it had a dark, triangle-shaped body with one unblinking light on each corner. the one in the front was greenish-white, the other two were yellowish-white.
since it was the second one we've seen, and there was so much traffic on the road, my wife asked, "how is it that people aren't seeing these all the time. i reminded her that it was in the paper that someone else had seen one very close to where we were with in the last year.
we felt a little chagrined, that even though we were a little more prepared this time over last time that we still didn't get anything. on film.
let us know if you'd like to hear more about the first time we saw one of these objects, i think you'll find it interesting. 
i'm attaching a map with a red circle that shows the location of the sighting. with in the red circle is a red arrow showing the flight path we observed.
content.summary: While driving eastbound on rt.76, my wife and i observed a very large, low-flying dark triangle with a light on each corner headed west -bound.

content.detailedDescription: Scanning the northwestern montana skies on july 31st 2014 about 1 a.M. caught this on video. i have alot of videos of wierd things over the montana and canadian rockies. not satalites, one craft leaves the others in the dust. view video about 1:24 into it and you'll see. what could it be ?
content.summary: Caught on my nightvision cam. 1:24 into the video

content.detailedDescription: This past sunday i decided i wanted to get some pictures of the super moon. i live in a townhouse development so in order to see the moon i had to wait for it to rise over tall structures. so about 7:45 i started to take pictures and i continued to take pictures for about an hour and a half . my first reaction to my pictures is that they weren't that good . later on that night i started to look through the pictures and what i seen in some of them i just can't explain. the first one i really noticed was in the back ground of a picture i took with my wife my first thought was i got a plane in the picture but when i zoomed in it had the shape of a top and was a light green color. i then began to look at all the pictures i had taken. i have a few more pictures with these green objects that have shape not just a blur. then i looked at some of the first pictures and i found a sequence of three pictures where there is a green object that is in a different position in each picture. the real kicker came when noticed that in one of those pictures there was another object. this object is flat dark grey in color and three white points of light and two red points of light.  it's not a plane!!! i am not a big believer in ufos and i really didn't see any of this with my eyes but what my camera caught i can not just write off and assume i know what it is. i took all of my pictures in raw format and are completely untouched, but i do not wish to openly display any of these pictures until they are seen by someone who can give me an explanation or tell me that they are indeed what i think they are. i am eager to hear back from mufon thanks for reading
content.summary: While trying to take pictures of the moon i unknowingly got pictures of objects i didn't even know were their please contact me

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed about 1130 pm , woke up panicked , clear liquid running outa my nose. went back to sleep . woke up at 10 am . lower back hurt soooo bad, hurt to the spine, i only felt that way 2 or 3 times before , it really felt like a epidural. i asked my husband if he could see anything>? he said there was a needle mark, i couldnt hardley move for 2 days, i showed all my friends like 4 or 5 of them, the i showed my doctor,,,
content.summary: Woke up in a panic..,around 1-4 am

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep. went to bed around 11pm. woke up in a panic, very scared. calmed down went back to sleep. when i got up , i noticed a very small hand print bruse,on my thigh, the print was very clear it was about 3inchs wide and 3 1/2 long, just a guessing, had 3 long fingers and a thumb, i took pictures, and went to doctor,
content.summary: Woke up between 1-4 am very scared. noticed a hand print on my thigh

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a fire ball shoot across the sky from east to west.It descended down fast until it was hovering over the trees behind my house about 30 feet in the air.It looked like a huge fire ball.Im haunted by this to this day.
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed a what we thought was a shooting star shoot across the sky ,then stop and descend down and hover over the tree line behind my house.It looked like a huge fire ball hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to lansing from detroit as i was driving this orb of energy came from behind me and flew into the distance and the orb stopped completely after traveling a few miles in under a second. at first i thought it was a shooting star because of how fast it traveled but then it just stopped and stayed stationary in the sky. i then pulled my phone out and started recording this orb as i was driving towards it i've since then lost the video i'm trying to recover it through old emails now. i recorded for 5 minutes and it didn't do anything so i stopped recording as i did that  i noticed the orb started moving i again started recording it the orb acended into the sky and it flew up to the actual ufo that was stationary in the sky. i witnessed the orb move to and from the actual ufo before the orb and ufo got lost in sight through the tree lines. that was my experience i know for a fact it was no helicopter plane satilite or anything of human nature. i was reluctant to report this because i looked into all the ufo investigators getting killed off but decided i should step up and do the right thing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One bright orb moving towards actually ufo which was stationary in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sat at home watching tv. it was the time all aircraft was grounded because of the volcanic ash. i couldnt believe how bright this thing was and how fast it travelled. i said to my daughter did she see it but she had not. the thing i couldnt understand was why anything was flying when it shouldn't be. i know what i saw but its taken me all this time to tell someone because i know how people react to ufos .
content.summary: All planes had been grounded due to volcanic ash. this object i thought was strange because nothing should be in our airspace

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were sitting in the backyard relaxing around 11-12 at night on a hot night when we noticed a glowing object hovering for about 10-15 min. seemed very odd it did not move, so we went inside to wake up my mom to see what she thought, we stared at it for about another 5-7 min and she went in to wake up my dad, he came out and said what are you guys doing and we told him look at that hovering light by this time it was almost 20-25 min., he said it's not a helicopter or obviously a plane so he went inside to get the camera and started pictures and that's when it started moving flying in different patterns unlike anything any of us had seen, it flew straight up really high and 2 other objects dropped out of it make trails of light like nothing else, they flew around maybe a couple minutes more then all flew off in an instant, we have very good pictures of the objects, i went inside to try and call the air force but they just gave me the run around from one line to the next, it even came out in the paper, but the really strange thing was at breakfast the next day no one said a word about what we saw and didn't remember till we developed some christmas pictures in january, i tried telling several papers my story but no one wanted to listen or hear it, the pictures have now been packed away for over 10 years and since re finding them would like someone to see them, thanks henry
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sitting in the back yard relaxing on a hot night noticed a light hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to go to work. seen a bright light in the sky, followed by a second one seconds later. i watch the two objects for about 3 to 4 minutes. the first one was flying in a straight line. the second one was behind the first one and moving in all different patterns. i watched and as soon as they appeared the disappeared in to thin air.
content.summary: Awesome

content.detailedDescription: I saw this on 28 nov 2007@ 9:30 pm in the clear sky. bangalore, india, this is moving on ne direction slowly and it is rotating and glowing itself after 5 to 10 minutes it is suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: I saw this in the clear sky. this is moving on ne direction  slowly and it is rotating and glowing itself after 5 to 10 minutes it is suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a pub in croydon, pa sitting outside with friends.   i was sitting with my back to the building so i’m looking up rte. 13 north towards bristol.  i notice a plane flying towards us from the bristol area and it catches my eye because the light was orange.  i start watching it a little more closely and i realize that yeah, the light really is orange and i don’t see the blinking lights that planes need to have due to faa regulations.  i figure it’s a helicopter.  

as it’s coming closer i notice another light orange light following behind it, spaced out a good bit, but coming from the same direction and flying on the same flight path.  okay, i figure they’re military planes or something.  so i’m watching these two lights fly our way and they seem to be going up in altitude as they get closer.  they kind of hook a slight right and keep going up…and i notice a third light coming along from the same place on the horizon, on the same flight path, spaced out the same as the first two.  now i’m intrigued so i point it out to the my friends.  as we’re watching, the first light seems to keep going higher…and it disappears kind of over cvs.  now there’s no cloud cover at all in the sky – nothing but stars, but this thing disappears.  and now, another light appears on the horizon – light #4.

at this point i grab my camera and start taking video.  i have four minutes of video of these lights coming from the same direction, spaced exactly apart, flying on the same path, and disappearing at the same spot.  two of the lights did come from a slightly different direction, seeming to come from behind croydon station apartments, but they disappeared at the same place as the rest.  we counted 11 of these lights by the time all was said and done.

i can honestly say i’ve never seen anything like it before.  you know i love planes and watch flight patterns and such but i’ve never seen orange lights or so many craft flying in the same flight pattern.  it reminded me of planes taking off from philly international on a busy day…plane up, count to 60, plane up, count to 60, plane up….  the lights disappeared all at the same spot and in the same exact way.  they didn’t go down to a pinpoint, they just kind of were there and then not there.   they made no sound at all.

so, i don’t know what they were but they weren’t standard planes.  we saw planes in the sky immediately after the event and they all had white headlights and the blue and red blinkers on the wings, they looked nothing like this.  

i’m *really* glad i had two other people witness this with me to confirm that what i was seeing was unusual.
content.summary: 11 orange orbs flying in a line, spaced evenly, which then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car with my parents and an aunt when we saw a stationary strange light in the sky. i proceeded to park my car and started to observe that light and i realized it was a trinagle shaped object with a red light in the center and a yellow light in each angle. after some minutes without moving, the tirangular object took a straight-line path. the object emitted a sound just the same as a commercial airplane. the object was really close to me, so i decided to took some pictures with my cellphone. it is not the first time we saw objects like that in that adress.
content.summary: I observed a trinagle shaped object with a red light in the center and a yellow light in each angle.

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in my back yard watching for meteors when a bright light appeared directly overhead. the object did not move it just expanded in size approximately 2-3 times, increased light intensity to super bright, brighter than the super moon that was in the southeast sky, then suddenly disappeared. it was the strangest thing i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Bright light that expanded and got brighter then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down street notice the big moon & bright light while going home. how bright the it was. thought it was a big star or planet. a big bright light by moon look like a circle hoover by moon. my feeling says it is a spaceship..Not surprised at all i'm a believer.  did not lose sight at all.
content.summary: Bright light  circular in shape

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to report 3 orb ufo's that were observed by me in august of 2013, 2 over the city of val-d'or, where i live, and one over my parents lakeside cottage in the woods in the preissac area which is a 45 minutes drive west from val-d'or.

my girlfriend (child/adult alien contactee) who's from the uk arrived in val-d'or from the uk on the 8th of august 2013.

it was a nice cloudless summer night. we decided to do  ce-5 protocols while doing some star watching as the stars were quite visible around 10pm that night. we were lying on my front lawn, watching satellites moving about in different directions.

first observation:

one small moving white star-like object caught our eye that seemed to be moving over the city of val-d'or,québec. it was moving in a south to north direction.
we had the habit of speaking to all stellar moving objects. 
next thing that happens is that small light starts to do huge light power ups as it was moving north. it powered up then became small...Powered up and became small..The intensity of the light was quite impressive. it did approx. 5 power ups before becoming small again and continued its course.

second observation:

we continued the ce-5 protocols and a few minutes after seeing the poweruping orb, a huge bright orange orb passes over my house from an approx. nw to sw direction. the orb looked as big as the sun from my perspective. it did a non-stop flyby directly over us, gliding silently. it was not moving fast. it was easily a few feat in length. i would say that the elevation was approx. the height of 2-3 telephone poles...So it was very close to us. so the whole thing lasted a few minutes before we could not see it anymore as it was too far away.

third observation:

roughly a week later after seeing my first two orb ships. i decided to go and visit my parents in preissac, québec.
my parents have a lake-side cottage in the woods. i was alone this time as my girlfriend was out visiting elsewhere. it was around 10pm. i decided to do some ce-5 protocols alone. there were no clouds. so i sat on a patio chair outside in the dark or sometimes walked around the house and sending my voice and thoughts out to space. approx. an hour after doing so i decide to take a quick break and chat with my parents inside the house. as soon as i come back outside, for some reason i decide to raise my head to look at the stars.. at that exact moment i see the same fly-by silent huge orange-lollipop orb gliding ever so silently over me at approx the same elevation as the one in val-d'or. higher than the tree line but not so far up as it as big as the sun again from my perspective.. not small like the orbs you see on youtube. 
as soon as i realized what i saw i run back into my parents house and tell my parents to come out quickly. my parents see the orb when it was a bit farther away. please understand that i was in the woods in the middle of nowhere when this happened.

i just want to say that we are used to seeing the iss space station as we can track it as it moves over val-d'or and we are used to seeing satellites. what i saw was out of the ordinary and new to me.. unlike my girlfriend as she is used to this sort of thing being a contactee and all.
since then we have been doing more ce-5's and seem to be getting powerups from small lights in orbit moving over us when we speak to them.
content.summary: 3 ufos observed in val-d'or area (québec,canada)

content.detailedDescription:
August 9th, 2014

there were 4-5 initial witnesses, including myself, my parents and my uncle and aunt. we were sitting in our campsite (m26) at meewasin area, makwa lake provincial park around a fire, it was a clear sky and there were only a few stars just starting to come out. my dad was sitting facing the northern sky when he noticed an orange light, unknown distance away (but appeared to be quite high given it's movement and going behind trees). it was about 40-45 degrees from the horizon, moving in a slight southern arc from north-northwest to north-northeast, total time around 1min. during this time and after there weren't any helicopters, planes or other aircraft noticed. it slowed down at least once during it's movement, and disappeared without warning. there was no noise during it's movement. i first thought it might be a jet far away but the complete lack of noise made me doubt that. i tried in vain to get a picture but my phone's camera couldn't capture it well enough. no one else around the campsite had any other good ideas about what it could have been. when i was trying to get a picture i had to walk out of the campsite into the forest about 40ft, there were a lot of tall pine trees that partially obscured my view.

about half hour later, another light appeared, same colour, apparent shape and distance away, following roughly the same path.

the following night (sunday, august 10th), around the same time we saw two lights, same colour, apparent shape and distance away, following the same paths as the lights the night before. they were about 5-10 degrees from the horizon away from each other, and still about 40-45 degrees from the horizon altogether. no noise this evening, at least one speed change was observed during each sighting (it appeared to slow down slightly, then speed back up before disappearing from sight).
content.summary: Orange lights moving in a slight southern arc from north-northwest to north-northeast for about a min, speed changes seen, no sound, disappeared from view suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i had been abducted as a child but like everyone else theres no one to talk to or help me. i believe they implanted something in my face./ i watch the skies and mufon. i am not a psyche patient. i have seen an alien before but have not told the public just my family. they believe me.  last night a terrific lightening storm came through houston.. my husband saw the show and as an air man remarkexd on its intensity. i was scared. i touched my face and worried about my kids..I coulnt sleep lastnight . i heard something at my backdoor and it juggled the security door. this is the last place i saw an alien. a few months before. i was terrified. i slept when morning came. i got up 2 hours later looked at my phone to discover ufo had been seen very close to my house. 3 different photos of it have been taken and are on the net under cypress perez houston. cyp the hype. he is a long time friend. he reposted what his friends saw and i am here telling you now because i feel an impending doom. 

[names removed/cms/tg] on facebook have pics of this event


as a child what happened to me is i went to bed at 3-4  years old woke up outside my house saying i got to go i got to go.. from that point on i was afraid of the star in the sky following me and little blue people. my face hurt really bad and the thing has never gone away. i am feeling the ball in my cheek now. recently when i turned 30 a few years ago i started remembering things.. like being yanked through the sky and aliens working on my shoulder or maybe my heart..Left side behind my shoulder.I have no health problems to speak of and the last time i saw an alien was in april, i think. it was wearing a pink bow like i had been the week before and it dawned on my it was my child. it was a grey type person small body and hairless huge eyes and pale blue or grey with a pink bow. why does this make me want to cry?I want to know what i can do to make these encounters stop effecting me in a negative way. i have a ton of stress because i feel very alone.
content.summary: I had a friend report his 3 different friends see this thing. it looks to me like the one that parked itself in the aruara borialis..2 point of light at tips and a center oval of lights with 1 in the middle  like a cockpit but invisibile.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the complex next door from me when i notice 6 bright lights flying very slow from east to west. as i stopped and tried to pull out my cell phone to take video my phone would not work. as i stood there watching the lights, more of the objects popped up one at a time just like turning on a light switch. i observed 6 to 10 objects moving very slow flying east to west. 2 of the objects stopped in mid air and hovered, it seemed like the 2 were waiting for the 3rd light that just popped in the sky, just like turning on a light switch. as the 3rd object caught up with the 2 that were hovering they then flew from east to west forming a triangle. as the lights flew to the west they suddenly disappeared just like turning off a light switch. as i stood there watching more of the lights popped on then flew to the west where the other lights popped off their lights went off at the same area where i saw the other lights went off at. i stood there hoping to see more of whatever i just saw when a helicopter circle the area along with 2 planes that i did not see but could hear because they were flying so high.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 to 10 bright pulsating lights flying east to west popping on and off like a light switch
